text: Dr. Jayant is simply outstanding and meticulous! I had a retina tear and was incredibly impressed by his thoroughness and expertise. He explained everything clearly, treated me with exceptional care. I felt completely at ease and in the best hands. Highly recommend Dr. Jayant for anyone needing expert eye care!
Professional eye doctors Dr Jason Lee and Dr Jayant who offers excellent eye care and medical advice. A nice clinic with friendly staff. Highly recommend!

Dr Jayant is an excellent surgeon. He listen attentively and explain very clearly to me about my cataract situation with images of my eyes and my surgery on both eyes were very successful. The staff at the clinic were very professional. Very good experience with the clinic.
Dr Jason Lee did my cataract surgery n he was very meticulous and professional.  The lens he recommended was so good that i can see far n near. Was very satisfied and happy with my clear vision now.

I first went to The Straits Eye Centre for a comprehensive eye checkup. Since I'm approaching mid-life, I thought it was time to do one. üòÅ  The clinic staff was very warm and friendly. Dr Jayant was very thorough in doing the examination and found something that needed attending to. I ended up doing a day procedure there that day. I really appreciated the simple explanation of my condition and that they gave me time and space to consider whether to do the procedure or not, and to work out my insurance coverage. In the whole process, they are genuinely caring and want the best for their patients. I highly recommend this clinic for anyone who needs eye care. Be prepared for the visit to take up to 2 hours though. The pre-consultation checks and tests do take time.
